select sel_no as selNo, sel_id as selId, sel_pw as selPw, sel_name as selName, sel_tel as selTel, sel_addr as selAddr, sel_enroll as selEnroll from seller_db where sel_id = #{selId}

select * from (select rownum as rnum, c.* from ( select cls_no as classNo, cls_name as className, sel_no as selNo, cls_det as classDetail, cls_price as classPrice, class_enroll as classEnroll, classstarttime as classStartTime, status, class_person as classPerson, class_date as classDate from class_db order by 1 desc)c) where rnum between #{start} and #{end}
